attributes.action: Parliament to be re-elected & Benefit cut MPs to step down
attributes.additional_details:
We the British people will no longer stand for the austerity of the current parliament and ask for the following;

-We ask that the current government is re-elected

-We ask that NIck Clegg and David Cameron resign from parliament as we the people of Britain believe they is not fit to be in power.

-We ask that Ian Duncan Smith, George Osborne,  Baroness Meacher and John Roberston stands down as we have lost faith in these Mp's due to their harsh targets for benefits involving welfare and benefits which will increase poverty, homelessness, destitution and several other dire consequences for the British people.

-We ask that any MP who still supports the current Benefit reform Step down or work with the people of Britain for a safe and secure future for all British citizens.

rejection.details: This needs to be more specific, at present their are too many elements to this petition.
